contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 30, 1969 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest - 1st Broxburn, 2nd Kinneil, 3rd Scottish CWS. Hymn tune - 1st Mirrlees, 2nd Mossley, 3rd tie between Broxburn and Dawdon Lodge Deportment - Mossley. 500th contest adjudicated by Drake Rimmer(British Bandsman 16/08/1969). 9 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:22 p.m. March 30, 2013, 10:49 a.m.
1 Broxburn Public Band Peter Wilson Resurgam
2 Mirrlees Works Band Jack Atherton
3 Unison Kinneil Band John Kirkwood
4 Mossley Band John Harrison
Unknown Result Cooperation Band Robert Oughton
Unknown Result Crookhall Colliery Douglas Bird
Unknown Result Dalmellington Band Hugh Johnstone
Unknown Result Dawdon Lodge Stan MacDonald
Unknown Result Lochgelly Band Robert Oughton
